item.title: Pretty Good Year
item.description: My last vacation back to Missouri was for Thanksgiving last year. Here is a short video composed of snippets of footage I shot while spending time with the family. Everything was shot with a Canon 5D Mark II outfitted with a Canon EF 24-70mm f/2.8L USM Lens and then edited together with Final Cut Pro on a MacBook Pro. Thanksgiving 2009 from Josh Farr on Vimeo. Also â€“ the Flickr Set from the trip.
